name: request-editor
description: A request complete HTTP request editor
author: The Advanced REST client authors <arc@mulesoft.com>

scripts.lint: polymer lint request-editor.html -r dom-module-invalid-attrs -r style-into-template -r undefined-elements -r behaviors-spelling -r databinding-calls-must-be-functions -r element-before-dom-module -r unbalanced-polymer-delimiters
